entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -42.3°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
